snippet: The couple met at Colgate, from which they graduated.
lead_paragraph: Karyn Whitney Bove and Antony Lai are to be married Sunday evening by the Rev. Dr. Harvard W. Stephens Jr., a Lutheran minister, at the Ritz-Carlton on St. Thomas in the United States Virgin Islands. The bride, 36, and the bridegroom, 35, met at Colgate, from which they graduated.
